default-create-account-text: Please click the button below to create your account.
default-questions: Questions? Just reply to this email.
default-signin: Please click the button below to sign in to your account.
uniport-signup-header: Invitation For UniPort, Universal Music's Supplier Portal
uniport-signin-header: Invitation For UniPort, Universal Music's Supplier Portal
uniport-invitation-text:
You have been invited to Universal Music’s UniPort supplier portal.

To help log into the portal, please clear your cookies and restart your browser.

Please click here if:

  • You are a new supplier to Universal Music Group, or
  • You have a current account and need to activate your secure login with 2-factor authentication
  • The link will expire in 7 days
uniport-registration-started-text: If you have already set up your two-factor authentication on the new portal, click
uniport-footer-text: This is an automated email generated by UniPort. Please do not reply to this email. If you think, it was sent to you incorrectly, please contact
uniport-invitation-login-text: You have been invited to UniPort application. Please click the button below to sign in to your account.
uniport-your-local: Your local UniPort Helpdesk is here to help. Please find contact details under the
thanks_text: Thank you for visiting the UNIVERSAL MUSIC GROUP website.
verify_code_text: We will inform you about the information necessary for additional authentication. Please enter the code below to verify.
send_only_text: ■ This e-mail is sent from a send-only e-mail address. Even if you reply, we cannot accept your request.
contact_info_text: ■ If you do not recognize this email, please contact us at the contact information below.
umpg_account_text: Please note – you will continue to receive relevant pitches and marketing communications from UMPG, even if you do not activate your UMPG Songs account
default-signin-password: Please use below password while sign-in to your account.
default-reset-password: Please click the button below to reset you password.
umpg_reset_password_steps: We are contacting you to inform you of the implementation of Azure AD Security for UMPG Songs. In order to gain access to your Songs account, you will need to set a new password which can be done by taking these simple steps;
umpg_step_3: Select 'Forgot Your Password / Reset Your Password' link and follow instructions to set a new password
umpg_note: Please note – you will continue to receive relevant pitches and marketing communications from UMPG, even if you do not activate your UMPG Songs account
guardian_footer: Reply directly to this e-mail or write to guardian-support@umusic.com for further assistance.
guardian_questions: If you have any questions, please reach out to guardian-support@umusic.com
guardian_body_1: We've reviewed your request for access to The Guardian and have approved your account. Please
guardian_body_3: to create your password and complete your account.
guardian_signin_text: to sign in to your account.
